description: Andrew Gee says this is the best lab you'll ever do in Engineering!
name: Lego Mindstorms

outcomes.description: Wow your totally original never-seen-before lego project completely blew the demonstrator's mind's away!
You made that clock that everyone seemed to make for some reason. Good job!
Your gear box broke apart mid-operation and hit the demonstrator in the eye!
You made a breakdancing lego robot! When asked what it's practical purpose was, you said you could use it for rescue.

description: Your objective is to build a truss/bridge. Take your pick!
name: Structural Design Project (SDP)

outcomes.description: Your structure handles the load with ease, even with the weight of your mum on it!
Your structure doesn't handle the full load, but at least its cost efficient. Well done.
You showed up without any drawings, dummy. Luckily your lab partner pulled their weight, unlike you (and your structure).
